name: Right on Q
description: Following a Borg incursion, Commander Riker sustains a suspicious injury. The Borg and the Augments are suddenly both in pursuit of your ship, as you and Commander Shelby must investigate why. Maintain command and steady your crew through the chaos.
rules:
— In a Skirmish Event, you will engage in space battles against thematically appropriate foes until the Event's conclusion.
— There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
— Unique Ship Battle Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
— Using any version of Shelby, Miss Q, Riker, crew from the Q Continuum, or matching a Battle Trait will provide a bonus.
— Using the U.S.S. Reliant, Nova Class, and Borg Sphere 878 will provide a bonus to hull.
— Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
— In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Shelby, Miss Q, Riker, or Q Continuum

featured_crew.name: Professor
featured_crew.flavor: Built by the Enterprise's computer, The Professor was built to be Detective Data's ultimate challenge.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Riker
rewards.flavor: When off-duty, Commander Riker often held poker nights for his fellow bridge officers.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

ship.name: Nova Class
ship.flavor: Designed for short-term missions of science and exploration. Features advanced sensor arrays.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

Honor: 14.11%

Credits: 33.29%

next_threshold_rewards.name: Credits
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

screens.text: "Captain, thank you for coming down so quickly. The Borg Sphere detected our presence, and after an exchange of phaser blasts, we had to beam directly to sick bay."

"My injuries aren't serious, but Commander Riker has not regained consciousness. I'm sorry the mission went sideways, Captain. I was hoping we'd be successful sabotaging that Sphere. Their technology, as you know, is constantly adapting."

"Commander Riker is stabilized, but his readings don't match those of his medical records. It's as though he's been altered somehow. I'll need  more targeted scans to understand the full extent of his injuries. Shelby, you should remain for observation."
"Due respect, Doctor, but I'll report back here after the Captain and I have dealt with this Borg Sphere that's now pursuing us...."
"Captain, thank you for coming down so quickly. The Borg Sphere detected our presence, and after an exchange of phaser blasts, we had to beam directly to sick bay."

"My injuries aren't serious, but Commander Riker has not regained consciousness. I'm sorry the mission went sideways, Captain. I was hoping we'd be successful sabotaging that Sphere. Their technology, as you know, is constantly adapting."

"Commander Riker is stabilized, but his readings don't match those of his medical records. It's as though he's been altered somehow. I'll need  more targeted scans to understand the full extent of his injuries. Shelby, you should remain for observation."
"Due respect, Doctor, but I'll report back here after the Captain and I have dealt with this Borg Sphere that's now pursuing us...."
